title: [Large-scale] Math Leadership Competency Enhancement Course Using Mobile Game Metaphors

context.additional_context: A gamified mathematics learning experience for corporate managers/leaders aged 40+, utilizing mobile environments with asynchronous learning accessible via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can solve basic statistical analysis problems with 80% accuracy through game-based mission completion.
Learners can explain data-driven decision-making processes via leadership simulation games within mobile apps.
Learners can establish personalized learning strategies by analyzing weekly learning achievement reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
